header: header.php - the header file - you can leave it empty
specificFile: .html - search only a specific file extension  - you can leave it empty
searchDir: /path/to/dir - directory of the search - you CAN'T LEAVE IT EMPTY
redi: https://example.lol/sus/?file=%file% - a redirect url where %file% = filename - you can leave it empty

errorMessages.foundNull: Hey! Non abbiano trovato nessun file seguendo i tuoi cicli!
errorMessages.erroEmptyVar: Hey! Pare che tu abbia impostato male la parte HTML
